mapper.select: select p.*, u.name submit_name, pl.name production_line_name, u1.name 'first_acceptor_name', u2.name 'final_acceptor_name' from purchase_income_submit p inner join user u on p.submit_id = u.id inner join production_line pl on p.production_line_id = pl.id left join user u1 on p.first_acceptor = u1.id left join user u2 on p.final_acceptor = u2.id where (status = 2 or p.final_acceptor = #{user_id}) and u.workcell_id = #{workcell_id} limit #{page_number},#{page_size}
select count(*) from purchase_income_submit p inner join user u on p.submit_id = u.id where (status = 2 or p.final_acceptor = #{user_id}) and u.workcell_id = #{workcell_id}
select p.*,u.name submit_name from purchase_income_submit p inner join user u on p.submit_id = u.id where p.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
update purchase_income_submit set final_time = now(),status = #{pass},final_acceptor = #{user.id},final_reason = null where id = #{id};
insert into operate(operate_man_id,operate_key_id,operate_time,table_name,field,type,old_value,new_value,operate_string) values(#{user.id},#{id},now(),'purchase_income_submit',#{field},'update',#{old_value},#{new_value}, concat('经理',#{user.name},'终审通过'))
mapper.select: select * from jig_definition j inner join jig_family f on j.family_id = f.id limit #{page_number},#{page_size}

select o.*, u.name 'operate_man_name', u.type 'operate_man_type' from operate o inner join user u on o.operate_man_id = u.id where u.workcell_id = #{workcell_id} and o.operate_key_id = #{submit_id} order by o.operate_time
select count(*) from purchase_income_submit where status = 2

select s.*, u1.name submit_name, u2.name first_acceptor_name, u3.name final_acceptor_name from scrap_submit s INNER JOIN user u1 on u1.id = s.submit_id LEFT JOIN user u2 on u2.id = s.first_acceptor LEFT JOIN user u3 on u3.id = s.final_acceptor where (s.status = 2 or s.final_acceptor = #{user_id}) and u1.workcell_id = #{workcell_id} limit #{page_number},#{page_size}
select count(*) from scrap_submit s INNER JOIN user u1 on u1.id = s.submit_id where (s.status = 2 or s.final_acceptor = #{user_id}) and u1.workcell_id = #{workcell_id}
mapper.update:
update scrap_submit set status = #{status},final_time = now(),final_acceptor = #{user.id},final_reason = null where id = #{submit_id};
insert into operate(operate_man_id,operate_key_id,operate_time,table_name,field,type,old_value,new_value,operate_string) values(#{user.id},#{submit_id},now(),'scrap_submit',#{field},'update',#{old_value},#{new_value}, concat('经理',#{user.name},'终审通过'))
mapper.select: select *,count(code) as 'count' from jig_position group by code

select p.submit_id,u.name 'submit_name',count(u.name) as 'submit_count' from purchase_income_submit_history p inner join user u on u.id = p.submit_id
and p.bill_no like concat('%',#{bill_no},'%')
and p.submit_name like concat('%',#{submit_name},'%')
and p.status = #{status}
and (STR_TO_DATE(p.submit_time,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN '${start_date}' AND '${end_date}')
group by u.name
